name: Finding The Panda
description:
Best looking Figure game! Unique, most worthy of collection.
Rules of the game is very simple, is to find the panda baby within the time specified in the picture.
Games with prompts, if it can not find, you can use the prompts.

Game Features:
· Different difficulty, step by step
The game has three different levels of difficulty, players can start from a simple beginning, slowly familiar with the game, then challenge themselves.
· Massive levels, beautiful pictures
The game has carefully prepared a picture waiting for your challenge.
But a person playing? It does not matter, quickly called on small partners together finding fault it. Remember owned drops oh ~~~
